name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Villager Boy 1;Glad to see the fog cleared up!|It sure makes it hard to get stuff done with it around!
speak;Eirika;Indeed.|Does it get foggy around here often?
speak;Villager Boy 1;Yeah! It's been happening more and more lately, too.|I wonder if it has something to do how many spiders keep showing up here...
speak;Eirika;There are even more spiders?|That can't be a good sign...
speak;Villager Boy 1;Yeah, probably not...|We've got to do something about them soon.|They're becoming quite a problem.
